data: In the _argot_ of the underworld, Chester Fay, alias Edward Letchmere, an expert on other peopleâ€™s strong-boxes, had lammistered to Short Hills, California, where an excellent golf-links surrounds a half-hotel, half-clubhouse of the superior order.
